sentences.sContent: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.sContent_eng: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.sCn: 研习商务：事实上，你阅读这篇博客是一个好的现象，因为从中你可以知道许多关于自由职业者如何经营自己事业的信息。

sentences.sContent: Then you might create a resume and start looking for work based on what positions you feel qualified for, or you might go freelance and/or build a business around your capabilities.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then you might create a resume and start looking for work based on what positions you feel qualified for, or you might go freelance and/or build a business around your capabilities.
sentences.sCn: 接着你就可以着手写简历、根据你认为有能力担当的职位寻找工作，或者做自由职业，或者/以及围绕你的能力开创自己的事业。

words.tran: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
自由民；享有市民权的人；荣誉市民
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

remMethod.val: free(自由) + lance(看作lines， 几行字) → 自由地写东西做事 → 当自由职业者
